english.segment1: When your only friends are hotel rooms. Hands are distant lullabies. If I could turn around I would tonight
english.segment2: These roads never seemed so long. Since your paperheart start beating leaving me suddenly alone. Will daybreak ever come?
english.segment3: Who's gonna call on sunday morning?. Who's gonna drive you home?. I just want one more chance. To put my arms in fragile hands
english.segment4: I thought you said forever. Over and over. A sleepless night becomes bitter oblivion
english.segment5: These thoughts run through my head. Over and over. Complaints of violins become my only friends
english.segment6: August evenings. Bring solemn warnings. To remember to kiss the ones you love goodnight
english.segment7: You never know what temporal days may bring. So laugh, love, live free and sing. When life is in dischord. Praise ye the lord
